channel.title: Festival on HOMEBREW COLLAB
channel.description: Recent content in Festival on HOMEBREW COLLAB

item.title: Love & Beer
item.description:
I wanted to write up a summary of the weekend. Im assuming by now most people are aware we were lucky enough to be invited to Love & Beer at the Hackney Taproom hosted by the Craft Beer Channel and the Malt Miller. As one of eight clubs representing in the homebrew marque it was a big deal, and one we couldnt turn down.

On the day we had a total of eight beers to offer the punters, as every homebrewer knows all too well we cant sell them, but we were able to serve them semi-proffesionally through a couple of borried Lindrs. On tap we had: -Hazy IPA - brewed by @SamThakkerJones incrredibly popular
